data.title: Birmingham City FC
data.meta_description:
Birmingham City FC | 29,007 followers on LinkedIn. The home of Birmingham City. | Established in 1875, Birmingham City Football Club is based in the heart of Britain's second city and currently competes in the Sky Bet Championship.

As members of the Premier League as recently as 2011, the Club can boast a host of notable achievements both on and off the field across its history. 

Birmingham City, also known as Blues, can offer loyal fans, businesses and individuals several opportunities away from the field of play.
data.text:
Established in 1875, Birmingham City Football Club is based in the heart of Britain's second city and currently competes in the Sky Bet Championship. As members of the Premier League as recently as 2011, the Club can boast a host of notable achievements both on and off the field across its history. Birmingham City, also known as Blues, can offer loyal fans, businesses and individuals several opportunities away from the field of play. Whether it's matchday hospitality packages, sponsorship opportunities, conferences or memorable events, there's something for everyone at St. Andrew's. For further details, visit our website or call our commercial team on 0844 557 1875, option 3.

Website

http://www.bcfc.com

External link for Birmingham City FC
